dcterms:description: A platform for evaluating state-of-the-art multi-agent reinforcement learning methods, specifically designed for cooperative micromanagement tasks in the StarCraft II environment.
dcterms:title: StarCraft II

dcterms:description: A benchmark platform for evaluating cooperative multi-agent reinforcement learning algorithms, featuring various scenarios and challenges in the StarCraft II environment.
dcterms:title: SMAC (StarCraft Multi-Agent Challenge)
